text:
Summary



CLSA adds Indiabulls Ventures to model portfolioXenok Limited and GS Mace Holdings will sell 4.42 percent in Max FinancialStrong results by OK Play; Weak performance by Kesoram Industries and Balkrishna PapersAditya Birla Capital circuit filter revised to 20 percent and shifted to ‘B’ groupInterGlobe Aviation QIP opens today in the price range of Rs1125 to Rs 1175 eachTeamlease Services: Manulife Asset Management (HK) bought 1.24 lakh shares (or 0.7 percent) at Rs 1615 eachICICI Lombard General Insurance IPO opens. Issue price at Rs 651-Rs 661






The Singapore-traded SGX Nifty, an early indicator of Nifty 50 Index’s performance in India, fell 0.63 percent to 10,060 as of 7:15 a.m.





All you need to know going into trade today. https://t.co/HFWP4c0Kp1 pic.twitter.com/qrpmbcEg3P— BloombergQuint (@BloombergQuint) September 15, 2017






Here are the stocks to watch in today’s session:
title: Stocks To Watch: Aditya Birla Capital, Indiabulls Ventures,  InterGlobe Aviation
